user_ssh_error: An error has occurred loading your SSH key list.
user_ssh_table_empty: You don't have any SSH keys saved.
user_ssh_tooltip_default_true: Stop using as default key for dedicated.
user_ssh_tooltip_default_false: Set as the default key for dedicated.
user_ssh_key_explain_1: OVH uses SSH to secure encrypted data communications between servers.
user_ssh_key_explain_2: There are SSH clients for each operating system.
user_ssh_key_explain_2_guide: Please read our guide on creating SSH keys to find out more.
user_ssh_key_explain_3: Please note that you can also configure additional SSH keys on your instance to grant access to other people, and you can change the SSH key if you have lost it.
user_ssh_default_help: The default key () is the one installed on your server if it goes into rescue mode.
user_ssh_add_modal_step1_question: Please enter a name and key in the fields below.
user_ssh_add_cloud_modal_step1_question: Please select the project you want to add an SSH key to.
user_ssh_add_success_message: The SSH key has been added.
user_ssh_add_error_message: An error has occurred adding the SSH key.
user_ssh_default_on_success_message: "{{t0}}" is now the default key for your account.
user_ssh_default_off_success_message: You no longer have a default key for your account.
user_ssh_default_error_message: An error has occurred changing the SSH key.
user_ssh_delete_modal_step1_question: Are you sure you want to delete the key {{t0}}?
user_ssh_delete_error_message: An error has occurred deleting the SSH key.
